channel.title: CWE-502 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-502 on ZAP

item.title: Java Serialization Object
item.description: Java Serialization seems to be in use. If not correctly validated, an attacker can send a specially crafted object. This can lead to a dangerous “Remote Code Execution”. A magic sequence identifying JSO has been detected (Base64: rO0AB, Raw: 0xac, 0xed, 0x00, 0x05).
